UpperArmsLVCurl.name: Lever Curl
UpperArmsLVCurl.preparation: Sit on seat and grasp handles with underhand grip.
UpperArmsLVCurl.execution: Raise lever handles until elbows are fully flexed with back of upper arm remaining on pad. Lower handles until arm is fully extended. Repeat.
UpperArmsLVCurl.comments: The biceps may be exercised alternating or simultaneous. If machine does not provide support for back of arm, keep elbows from traveling back, particularly during initial flexion. Some machines do not offer adequate resistance at initial range of motion. Consider positioning wrists with slight flexion to compensate.

UpperArmsLVAlternatingCurl.name: Lever Alternating Curl
UpperArmsLVAlternatingCurl.preparation: Sit on seat and grasp handles with underhand grip.
UpperArmsLVAlternatingCurl.execution: Raise lever on handle until elbow is fully flexed with back of upper arm remaining on pad. Lower handle until arm is fully extended. Repeat with opposite arm. Continue to alternate movement between sides.
UpperArmsLVAlternatingCurl.comments: The biceps may be exercised simultaneous. If machine does not provide support for back of arm, keep elbows from traveling back, particularly during initial flexion. Some machines do not offer adequate resistance at initial range of motion. Consider positioning wrists with slight flexion to compensate.
